name: Upload files in Noloco comments to Google Drive
description:
Keep your files safe and organized by automatically uploading any attachment added to a comment in your Noloco app to a folder in Google Drive. Whether users are sharing PDFs, images, or documents in comments, this workflow ensures everything is securely stored in Drive.

How it works:
This template monitors new comments in Noloco. If a file is attached, it uploads that file to the Google Drive folder you specify.

Before using this template:
Make sure your Noloco app includes comment functionality where users can attach files. You'll also need to have a folder in Google Drive ready to receive these uploads.

This template was created by Noloco.
